GENERAL.FURTHERINFORMATION: Head to the marker at ~y~{0}~w~ and provide a ~b~police presence~w~ in the designated area.
GENERAL.NOTIFICATION: Stay parked up and watch for ~o~suspicious activity~w~.

OUTCOME.NOTIFICATION: A ~r~suspicious bag~w~ has been located nearby!
Try to ~o~defuse~w~ the bomb by locating the ~r~person who dropped it~w~.
You ~r~located the bomber~w~. Arrest them to receive the ~g~bomb override code.
You ~g~retrieved the override code~w~. Go to the ~r~bomb~w~.
Press ~y~{0}~w~ to ~r~defuse the bomb~w~ without the override code (located on the person who dropped the bag).
Press ~y~{0}~w~ to ~r~defuse the bomb~w~ with the override code.
Enter the override code, a number between 1-9.
Guess the override code, a number between 1-9.
~r~Invalid input.~w~ Please provide a number between ~y~1~w~ and ~y~9~w~.
The Area Surveillance occured ~g~without incident~w~. Returning to patrol.
